DOC.brief_summary: The objective study investigate 3 site ( University Connecticut , University Florida , University California , Irvine ) whether enhancement modify Mediterranean-style , low glycemic load diet ( MED ) specific phytochemical ( soy protein , phytosterols , rho iso-alpha acid proanthocyanidins ; PED ) could improve cardiometabolic risk factor woman metabolic syndrome .
DOC.brief_title: Trial Two Dietary Programs Cardiometabolic Risk Factors Subjects With Metabolic Syndrome
DOC.detailed_description: As worldwide dietary pattern become westernize , metabolic syndrome reach epidemic proportion . Lifestyle modification include diet exercise recommend first-line intervention treat metabolic syndrome . Previously , report specific phytochemical supplementation 12 week ( soy protein , phytosterols , rho iso-alpha acid proanthocyanidins ) increase effectiveness modify Mediterranean-style low glycemic load dietary program variable associate metabolic syndrome CVD subject metabolic syndrome elevate LDL cholesterol . In study , propose conduct multi-center randomize trial confirm previous finding .
DOC.criteria: BMI ≥25 < 45 LDL > 100 mg/dl TG ≥150 < 400 mg/dl meet 2 follow 4 criterion : HDL < 50 mg/dl blood pressure ≥130/85 mmHg ( diagnosed hypertension medication ) fast glucose ≥100 mg/dl < 150 mg/dl waist circumference > 35 inch Medical History Concurrent Diseases 1 . Over precede 4 week , initiation cessation regular exercise 2 . Over precede 4 week , involvement significant diet weight loss program Atkin 's diet program , low calorie liquid program ( Optifast , Medifast , HMR ) , diet lead weight loss 10 % body weight period 6 week 3 . Use blood sugar lower medication include thiazolidinedione class oral medication include Avandia ( rosiglitazone ) , Avandamet ( metformin/rosiglitazone ) , Actos ( pioglitazone ) , metformin ( Glucophage , Fortamet , Riomet ) insulin precede 12 week 4 . Over precede 4 week , regular use Kaprex® Kaprex AI® least 3 days/week 5 . Over precede 4 week , regular use NSAIDs ( i.e . ibuprofen , celecoxib , etc . ) least 3 day per week 6 . Over precede 12 week , use cholesterol lowering medication , either prescription ( statin , etc . ) overthecounter ( gugulipids , niacin , etc . ) 7 . Over precede 12 week , use oral injectable corticosteroid , prednisone 8 . Current use oral anticoagulant Coumadin injectable anticoagulant Heparin Low Molecular Weight Heparin 9 . Use electronic implant pacemaker , defibrillator , nerve stimulators 10 . Allergy one ingredients investigational product 11 . Poorly control hypertension ( blood pressure 155/95 ) 12 . History significant liver kidney disease ( recent ongoing hepatitis , cirrhosis , glomerulonephritis , dialysis treatment , etc . ) 13 . History serious heart disease ( heart attack , angina , cardiac surgery , arrhythmia , congestive heart failure ) 14 . History deep vein thrombosis pulmonary embolus ( blood clot lung ) 15 . History autoimmune disease inflammatory bowel disease ( Crohn 's disease , and/or ulcerative colitis ) , multiple sclerosis , rheumatoid arthritis , systemic lupus erythematosus , polymyositis , scleroderma thyroiditis 16 . History eat disorder ( anorexia nervosa bulimia ) precede 5 year 17 . History alcoholism drug addiction precede 5 year 18 . History serious mental illness 19 . History attempt suicide past 10 year 20 . Untreated endocrine , neurological , infectious disorder 21 . Diagnosis Human Immunodeficiency Virus ( HIV ) Acquired HIV ( AIDS ) 22 . Current cancer history cancer ( except skin cancer ) 23 . Pregnancy lactation 24 . If female childbearing potential , unwillingness practice reliable method birth control ( i.e . physical sperm barrier hormonal therapy ) 25 . Any sound medical , psychiatric and/or social reason determine Principal Investigator ( PI ) . Physical Laboratory Test Findings 1 . TG ≥ 400 mg/dl 2. abnormal blood count ( Hct < 30 > 47 % , WBC < 3,000 > 12,000 , platelet < 140 > 500 ) 3. abnormal kidney function test ( ) ( BUN > 30 mg/dL creatinine > 1.5 mg/dL ) liver function test ( ) ( bilirubin total > 2.0 mg/dL , ALT > 75 IU/L , AST > 75 IU/L ; Alk Phos > 130 IU ) 4. fast glucose > 150 mg/dL , serum calcium ( > 10.5 mg/dL ) , positive pregnancy test ( ßhCG blood )
